57.eng-name: One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)

hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) died, and there was nothing in my house that a living being could eat, except some barley Lying on a shelf. So, I ate of it for a long period and measured it, and (after a short period) it was consumed

chapter.ara-name: باب نَفَقَةِ نِسَاءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بَعْدَ وَفَاتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The expenditure of the wives of the Prophet (ﷺ) ﷺ
